**Task 1a**

Y\~Normal(mu=15, var=116)

**Task 1b**

```{r}

simf = function(seed){
  
  set.seed(seed)
  Y = rnorm(100, mean = 15, sd = sqrt(116))
  Y2 = ((Y-15)^2)/116
  
  c(mean(Y), mean(Y2))
}

```

```{r}
simf(1)
```

**Task 1c**

```{r}

M = matrix(nrow = 1000, ncol = 2)

for (i in 1:1000){
  M[i,] = simf(i)
}
  
```

```{r}
apply(M, 2, mean)
```
